pathAssistantSteps.info: The order is allocated to a fulfillment location, assigned to a fulfillment order, and moved to an allocated status. Allocations are set to collect payment at the time of shipping.
The order items from the fulfillment order are assigned for picking & packing.
The order has been submitted via commerce site, but is not yet shipped or fulfilled.
The order items have been packed and dispatched to the carrier to be shipped to the customer.

The Order is currently being prepared for shipping. This step usually includes:

  • picking and packaging products in an envelope, bag or box
  • labelling the order for shipment
  • shipping the package with a carrier (Excluding Store Pickup Orders)
